statements.query: MATCH (bucket:S3Bucket)<-[:RESOURCE]-(aws:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WITH bucket LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE REMOVE bucket.anonymous_access_type return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (bucket:S3Bucket{is_public: true})<-[:RESOURCE]-(aws:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WITH bucket WHERE (NOT EXISTS(bucket.anonymous_access_type)) OR (NOT 'policy' IN bucket.anonymous_access_type) SET bucket.anonymous_access = true, bucket.anonymous_access_type = coalesce(bucket.anonymous_access_type , []) + 'policy';

MATCH (acl:S3Acl)-[:APPLIES_TO]->(bucket:S3Bucket)<-[:RESOURCE]-(aws:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})
WHERE acl.uri IN ['http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers', 'http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AuthenticatedUsers'] AND acl.permission = 'WRITE'
AND (acl.ownerid = acl.granteeid)
SET bucket.anonymous_access = true, bucket.anonymous_actions = coalesce(bucket.anonymous_actions, []) + ['s3:DeleteObjectVersion'] WITH bucket WHERE (NOT EXISTS(bucket.anonymous_access_type)) OR (NOT 'acl' IN bucket.anonymous_access_type) SET bucket.anonymous_access_type = coalesce(bucket.anonymous_access_type , []) + 'acl';
